key.name: custom-statusbar
key.summary: If the plugin source's custom status bar should be used.
key.description: Determines if the plugin should use the source's custom statusbar to show the current selected album's related information instead of the global Rhythmbox's statusbar.

key.name: display-tracks
key.summary: Display tracks when album is chosen
key.description: Adds an expander widget to the coverart view to allow the display of tracks for the chosen album.

key.name: display-text
key.description: Show the album's basic information under the cover image.

key.name: display-text-loading
key.description: Show's the text for each album during the source load. Deactivating this option may help with the loading performance.

key.name: display-text-ellipsize
key.description: Ellipsizes the albums names to a fixed length when the display text option is enabled.

key.name: display-text-ellipsize-length
key.description: This is the maximum allowed size for an album's name before being ellipsized.
